input.sentences: city kids thing they have it all | but i will tell ya nothing beats a good old fashioned farm fare .
you get to see tons of adorable animals like this baby cow attempting to find it 's mother .
you even get a ton of people that are more then willing to dress up for the occasion .
of course lets not forget about the amazing amusement park rides .
not to mention their is a ton and i mean a ton of great food to be had .
